price: 35. No Laghw (dirty, false, evil talk) shall they hear therein, nor lying;
arabic: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا كِذَّٰبٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan walā kidhāban
